message.entry: Incorrect number of input arguments. Each name-value argument must include both the name and the value.
Reference image container must be a scalar externalImageContainer object.
"AlphaChannel" name-value argument supported only for the "BGRA" color format.
Size of alpha channel data must match the first two dimensions of the input image data.
Alpha channel data must be the same data type as the input image data.
Length of {0} vector must be Height*Width*NumChannels of the image container.
Argument must be a scalar externalImageContainer object.
Data type of UnderlyingData must match the UnderlyingType property.
"AlphaChannel" name-value argument is not supported when "InputRGBFormat" value is "MatchesInputColorFormat".
"{0}" name-value argument is supported only for the "RGB", "BGR" or "BGRA" color formats.
Number of channels {0} in input image data does not match expected value. The expected value for the "{1}" color format is {2}.
Number of channels {0} in input image data does not match expected value. The expected value for the "{1}" color format is {2} when the "InputRGBFormat" value is "MatchesInputColorFormat".
Incorrect input image data type {0} for color format "{1}".
externalImageContainer의 영상 데이터에 액세스하려면 Computer Vision Toolbox가 필요합니다.
